{"id":406939810,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1602340947,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/406939810/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"6 MB","code":"#include <math.h>\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        long int res = 0;\n        int sign = 1;\n        if (x < 0)\n        {\n            sign = -1;\n            x = abs(x);\n        }\n        while (x > 0)\n        {\n            res = res * 10 + x % 10;\n            x = x / 10;\n        }\n        \n        if (res < INT_MAX && res > INT_MIN)\n            return (int) sign * res;\n        else\n            return 0;\n                \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
